name: Crow
info:
A cheerful one who also tries to cheer everyone else up. Extroverted, honest, optimistic, and a little over joyous at times.
He's always practicing flashy dagger tricks, and collecting bad jokes that he tells often.
Under his carefree appearance lies strong determination. Once he commits to something, he will not stop until it's done, and it's also why he's sometimes too hard on himself.
description:
As an ex-Executor, Crow maintains a good relationship with Hykros. He didn't make any critical mistakes, and he was not let go due to poor performance. He simply realized that he longed for a life with fewer rules after working with the team there for a while, and made the decision that worked for him.
He now travels freely over long periods of time. His cheerful personality leaves a great first impression on those who he comes across, and he always performs new tricks or jokes when he arrives at a new place. They call him Crowy, and he doesn't mind.

skills.name: Twin Blades
skills.description: While on the ground, brandish the pair of dual blades to launch up to 5 consecutive attacks. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 60.1% of ATK plus 3 and knock the target back a short distance. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 73% of ATK plus 4 and knock the target back a short distance. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 90.9% of ATK plus 5 and knock the target back a short distance. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 96.8% of ATK plus 5 and knock the target back a short distance. Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 202.2% of ATK plus 11 and knock the target back a short distance.

skills.name: Sky Flurry
skills.description: While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 65.6% of ATK plus 3. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 38.4% of ATK plus 2. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 92% of ATK plus 5. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 138% of ATK plus 7.

skills.name: Rapid Lunge
skills.description: After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Rapid Lunge. Upon hit, strongly suspend the target, dealing total damage equal to 116.8% of ATK plus 6.

skills.name: Spiral Drive
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Spiral Drive. While falling, deal damage equal to 42% of ATK plus 2 each hit.

skills.name: Sneak Attack
skills.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to trigger Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to 570% of ATK plus 30.

skills.name: Flying Blades
skills.description: Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Flying Blades. Slash a target 5 times, each dealing damage equal to 26.4% of ATK plus 1. Grant immunity to control effects while phasing.

skills.name: Returning Blades
skills.description: Fire 6 returning blades, each dealing damage equal to 52.8% of ATK plus 3. Gains hyperbody for up to 8 seconds, and the effect is removed when the blades return. 45 -second cooldown.

skills.name: Orbiting Blades
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, remove all debuffs from the wielder and dash to the target location, dealing damage equal to 86.9% of ATK plus 5 and electrocuting the target (after 5 seconds, deals volt damage equal to 15% of damage dealt, up to 350% of the Wanderer's ATK. This is an abnormal status that can be dispelled). Also spawn 3 blades that orbit around the Wanderer, dealing damage equal to 65.2% of ATK plus 3 to those that touch them.

weapon_type.name: Volt
weapon_type.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will strongly paralyze targets for 1 second and electrify them for 6 seconds, removing all their buffs and dealing damage equal to 144% of ATK. Targets can't receive any buffs for the next 6 seconds.

advancement: Attacking targets from behind increases crit rate of all dual blade attacks by 40%. Backstabbing an electrified target increases crit rate by 100% and crit damage by 30%.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 16%.
Increase damage by 30% to targets with less than 60% HP.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by 32%.
Triggering a Back Attack grants a 100% crit chance for the next 4 seconds and increases crit damage by 50%. Cooldown: 10 seconds.
After using a skill, increase volt damage dealt to the target by 20% for 20 seconds.

traits.name: Loner
traits.description: When Crow is not in a team, increase damage dealt by 6% and reduce damage received by 4%.

traits.name: Silent Night
traits.description: When Crow is not in a team, increase damage dealt by 10% and reduce damage received by 6%. When Crow enters combat, increase damage dealt by 12% for 12 seconds.
